General.Name: SEP Analytical (Shanghai) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: SEP Analytical (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. operates as a third-party testing organization in China. It offers soil, water quality, gas, solid waste, food, agricultural products, consumer goods, cosmetics, and other testing services related to human health. The company also provides technology development, technical consulting, and technical services in the field of detection technology, laboratory equipment sales, conference services, business consulting, and market information consulting and surveys. It serves the governments, as well as consulting agencies, engineering companies, and end customers. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Shanghai, China.
